title: 771 - The Last of the Starks | Game of Drones S8 E4
description:
We say goodbye to the day, goodbye to some friends and some pups and goodbye to good governance all in the name of good sleep.

Please fill out our survey at https://feedback.surveynerds.com/sleepwithme

(You can find all of our sponsors or become a patron on our new website http://www.sleepwithmepodcast.com story starts at about 20:00)

Commission a song from the Mystery Bard over athttp://www.jonathanmann.net

Tonight’s episode is sponsored by Casper. Get $100 toward select mattresses by visiting http://www.casper.com/sleepwith and using “sleepwith” at checkout. Terms and Conditions apply. You can be sure of your purchase with Casper’s 100 night risk-free, sleep-on-it trial.

Welcome our newest sponsor Robinhood - an investing app that lets you buy and sell stocks, E-T-F’s (exchange-traded funds), options, and cryptos- all commission-free. They strive to make financial services work for everyone, not just the wealthy.
Robinhood is giving listeners a FREE stock like Apple, Ford or Sprint to help build your portfolio. Sign up at sleep.robinhood.com!

Welcome our newest sponsor Wix! Create a stunning website via wix.com/sleep and get 10% a Wix premium plan today! Wix has over 500 amazing templates to start with and over 140 million people use Wix for their website. I’m working on a special Wix website you can check out soon!! So get over to wix.com/sleep!
